commit.message: Exclude signature files from test dependencies

nodes.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
              exclude 'META-INF/*.RSA', 'META-INF/*.SF','META-INF/*.DSA'
          
          
            
                      exclude "META-INF/INDEX.LIST"
          
          
            
                      exclude "META-INF/*.SF"
          
          
            
                      exclude "META-INF/*.DSA"
          
          
            
                      exclude "META-INF/*.RSA"
